FuncDef:
The mpls te tedb fast-notice command is used to enable CSPF fast switching.
The undo mpls te tedb fast-notice command is used to disable CSPF fast switching.
By default, CSPF fast switching is not configured.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
If BFD detection is not configured, after the primary LSP fails, the TE Hot-standby switchover is triggered by the protocol convergence. To improve the switching speed, you can enable the CSPF fast switching function by using the mpls te tedb fast-notice command.
